attributes.action: A REFERENDUM ON WITHDRAWAL FROM THE EUROPEAN UNION
attributes.additional_details:
The EU is now so riddled with corrupt financial management that its accountants have never signed off its accounts. The UK tax payer is now financially supporting countries which which have no intention of cutting their own costs and living within their means.
It is time the UK taxpayers had a say. We should now have the promised debate and referendum on our continued membership.
